ABOUT US

About Us

BottleTrade is a social media website that allows wine, spirit and craft beer enthusiasts to interact with each other through our network. We designed the site with the intention of allowing these enthusiasts to share their personal collections with other users across the internet. Our feature set includes, but is not limited to, a personal profile, Cyber Cellar, Trader Feed, custom trading tools and social media integration backed by an extensive database of brewery, winery, distillery and beverage entries.

Credits

- Initial database content from the Open Beer Database http://www.openbeerdb.com
